exceptions.tactic: apply Rbar_is_glb_eq with E1 E2; auto.
exceptions.exn: In environment E1, E2 : Rbar -> Prop H : forall x : Rbar, E1 x <-> E2 x Unable to unify "?M2311 = ?M2312" with "Rbar_is_lower_bound E1 (Rbar_glb E1) /\\ (forall b : Rbar, Rbar_is_lower_bound E1 b -> Rbar_le b (Rbar_glb E1))".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
E2: Rbar -> Prop
E1: Rbar -> Prop

Goal:
(forall x : Rbar, E1 x <-> E2 x) -> Rbar_glb E1 = Rbar_glb E2

Premises:
Inductive Rbar : Set := Finite : R -> Rbar | p_infty : Rbar | m_infty : Rbar For Finite: Argument scope is [R_scope]
Rbar_glb = fun E : Rbar -> Prop => proj1_sig (Rbar_ex_glb E) : (Rbar -> Prop) -> Rbar Argument scope is [function_scope]
Rbar_lub_rw : forall E1 E2 : Rbar -> Prop, (forall x : Rbar, E1 x <-> E2 x) -> Rbar_lub E1 = Rbar_lub E2
Rbar_is_glb_eq : forall (E1 E2 : Rbar -> Prop) (l1 l2 : Rbar), (forall x : Rbar, E1 x <-> E2 x) -> Rbar_is_glb E1 l1 -> Rbar_is_glb E2 l2 -> l1 = l2
Rbar_is_lub_eq : forall (E1 E2 : Rbar -> Prop) (l1 l2 : Rbar), (forall x : Rbar, E1 x <-> E2 x) -> Rbar_is_lub E1 l1 -> Rbar_is_lub E2 l2 -> l1 = l2
Lub_Rbar_eqset : forall E1 E2 : R -> Prop, (forall x : R, E1 x <-> E2 x) -> Lub_Rbar E1 = Lub_Rbar E2
Glb_Rbar_eqset : forall E1 E2 : R -> Prop, (forall x : R, E1 x <-> E2 x) -> Glb_Rbar E1 = Glb_Rbar E2
Rbar_is_glb_ext : forall (E1 E2 : Rbar -> Prop) (l : Rbar), (forall x : Rbar, E1 x <-> E2 x) -> Rbar_is_glb E1 l -> Rbar_is_glb E2 l
Rbar_is_lub_ext : forall (E1 E2 : Rbar -> Prop) (l : Rbar), (forall x : Rbar, E1 x <-> E2 x) -> Rbar_is_lub E1 l -> Rbar_is_lub E2 l
Rbar_lub_subset : forall E1 E2 : Rbar -> Prop, (forall x : Rbar, E1 x -> E2 x) -> Rbar_le (Rbar_lub E1) (Rbar_lub E2)
Rbar_glb_subset : forall E1 E2 : Rbar -> Prop, (forall x : Rbar, E2 x -> E1 x) -> Rbar_le (Rbar_glb E1) (Rbar_glb E2)
Rbar_is_ub_subset : forall (E1 E2 : Rbar -> Prop) (l : Rbar), (forall x : Rbar, E1 x -> E2 x) -> Rbar_is_upper_bound E2 l -> Rbar_is_upper_bound E1 l
Rbar_is_lb_subset : forall (E1 E2 : Rbar -> Prop) (l : Rbar), (forall x : Rbar, E1 x -> E2 x) -> Rbar_is_lower_bound E2 l -> Rbar_is_lower_bound E1 l
Rbar_is_lub_subset : forall (E1 E2 : Rbar -> Prop) (l1 l2 : Rbar), (forall x : Rbar, E1 x -> E2 x) -> Rbar_is_lub E1 l1 -> Rbar_is_lub E2 l2 -> Rbar_le l1 l2
Rbar_is_glb_subset : forall (E1 E2 : Rbar -> Prop) (l1 l2 : Rbar), (forall x : Rbar, E2 x -> E1 x) -> Rbar_is_glb E1 l1 -> Rbar_is_glb E2 l2 -> Rbar_le l1 l2
is_glb_Rbar_eqset : forall (E1 E2 : R -> Prop) (l : Rbar), (forall x : R, E2 x <-> E1 x) -> is_glb_Rbar E1 l -> is_glb_Rbar E2 l
is_lub_Rbar_eqset : forall (E1 E2 : R -> Prop) (l : Rbar), (forall x : R, E2 x <-> E1 x) -> is_lub_Rbar E1 l -> is_lub_Rbar E2 l
is_ub_Rbar_subset : forall (E1 E2 : R -> Prop) (l : Rbar), (forall x : R, E2 x -> E1 x) -> is_ub_Rbar E1 l -> is_ub_Rbar E2 l
is_lb_Rbar_subset : forall (E1 E2 : R -> Prop) (l : Rbar), (forall x : R, E2 x -> E1 x) -> is_lb_Rbar E1 l -> is_lb_Rbar E2 l
Rbar_is_glb_unique : forall (E : Rbar -> Prop) (l : Rbar), Rbar_is_glb E l -> Rbar_glb E = l
Rbar_opp_glb_lub : forall E : Rbar -> Prop, Rbar_glb (fun x : Rbar => E (Rbar_opp x)) = Rbar_opp (Rbar_lub E)
Tauto.eval_f_morph : forall (ex : ?TX -> Prop) (ev ev' : ?TA -> Prop) (f : Tauto.GFormula), (forall a : ?TA, ev a <-> ev' a) -> Tauto.eval_f ex ev f < -> Tauto.eval_f ex ev' f where ?TA : [E1 : Rbar -> Prop E2 : Rbar -> Prop |- Type] ?TX : [E1 : Rbar -> Prop E2 : Rbar -> Prop |- Type] ?AA : [E1 : Rbar -> Prop E2 : Rbar -> Prop |- Type] ?AF : [E1 : Rbar -> Prop E2 : Rbar -> Prop |- Type]
Tauto.GFormula_ind : forall P : Tauto.GFormula -> Prop, P Tauto.TT -> P Tauto.FF -> (forall t : ?TX, P (Tauto.X t)) -> (forall (t : ?TA) (a : ?AA), P (Tauto.A t a)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> forall g0 : Tauto.GFormula, P g0 -> P (Tauto.Cj g g0)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> forall g0 : Tauto.GFormula, P g0 -> P (Tauto.D g g0)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> P (Tauto.N g)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> forall (o : option ?AF) (g0 : Tauto.GFormula), P g0 -> P (Tauto.I g o g0)) -> forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g where ?TA : [E1 : Rbar ->...-> Prop |- Type]
PropExtensionalityFacts.PropExt_and_PropFunExt_iff_PredExt : (forall A B : Prop, A <-> B -> A = B) /\ (forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x = Q x) -> P = Q) < -> (forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x <-> Q x) -> P = Q)
PropExtensionalityFacts.PropExt_and_PropFunExt_imp_PredExt : (forall A B : Prop, A <-> B -> A = B) -> (forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x = Q x) -> P = Q) -> forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x <-> Q x) -> P = Q
PropExtensionalityFacts.PredExt_imp_PropFunExt : (forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x <-> Q x) -> P = Q) -> forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x = Q x) -> P = Q
PropExtensionalityFacts.PredExt_imp_PropExt : (forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x <-> Q x) -> P = Q) -> forall A B : Prop, A < -> B -> A = B

```coq
intros H.
assert (Rbar_is_glb E1 (Rbar_glb E1)).
apply Rbar_is_glb_ext with E2; auto.
assert (Rbar_is_glb E2 (Rbar_glb E1)).
apply Rbar_is_glb_ext with E1; auto.
apply Rbar_is_glb_eq with E1 E2; auto.
Qed.

original: intros H. assert (Rbar_is_glb E1 (Rbar_glb E1)). apply Rbar_is_glb_ext with E2; auto. assert (Rbar_is_glb E2 (Rbar_glb E1)). apply Rbar_is_glb_ext with E1; auto. apply Rbar_is_glb_eq with E1 E2; auto.
